attributes.action: Actually listen to the public and take a note of these petitions and not just ignore them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the past 2 years I have signed a number of petitions on here and not one of them has had a satisfactory response. Most of the time you get some spin like 'in real terms its cheaper', if it was cheaper do you think I'd be petitioning? In some of the responses the individual that has started the petition has some good points that are just ignored and answered by generalisations when the petition needs a detailed response!

I therefore ask that this be a petition to actually listen to these petitions and maybe contact some of the individuals for their reasoning behind their opinions then maybe the government might learn from it's mistakes and not blindly keep going with the blinkers on!
